datafield.subfield: PHI CD ROM #5.3, Latin Canon, bibliographic screen (Fenestella)
12.Halbbd., col. 2177-2179 (Fenestella; historical antiquarian author; according to Jerome, lived 70 years (52 B.C.-19 A.D.); according to other opinion, 35 B.C.-35 A.D.)
p. 360 (Fenestella; 52 B.C.-A.D. 19 or, possibly 35 B.C.-A.D. 36; antiquarian annalist, wrote a Roman history in at least 22 books)
p. cviii-cxii (Fenestella; accordin to Jerome, lived for 70 years between 52 B.C.-19 A.D.; other authorities, based on Pliny, argue for dates of ca. 35 B.C.-36 A.D.)
Dict. of Greek and Roman biography and mythology, 1967:
v. 2, p. 145 (Fenestella; Roman historian, d. according to the Eusebian Chronicle, A.D. 21 in the 70th year of his age)
